name: L3Harris
description: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. provides mission-critical solutions for government and commercial customers worldwide. It operates through Space & Airborne Systems (SAS), Integrated Mission Systems (IMS), Communication Systems (CS), and Aerojet Rocketdyne (AR) segments. The SAS segment provides satellite space payloads, sensors, and full-mission solutions; classified intelligence and cyber; airborne combat systems; and mission networks for air traffic management operations. The IMS segment offers intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR) systems; passive sensing and targeting; electronic attack platforms; autonomy; power and communications; networks; and sensors. The CS segment provides tactical radios, software, waveforms, satellite
